author: Justine Pattison
method: Put the oats and cinnamon in a non-stick saucepan with the milk and cook over a low-medium heat for 4-5 minutes, stirring constantly until rich and creamy. Pour into two deep bowls. Coarsely grate the pear, and place on top of the porridge. Squeeze over the lemon juice and sprinkle with a tiny pinch of ground cinnamon.
ingredients: 60g/2¼oz jumbo porridge oats,  ¼ tsp ground cinnamon, plus a little to sprinkle,  300ml/10fl oz semi-skimmed milk,  1 ripe medium pear,  1 wedge lemon
